idea:
To carry on business of manufacturing and dealers in all kinds of raw and finished cosmetics, perfumes and essences, dentifrices, lotions, extracts, greases, creams, salve, ointments, pomades, powders, unguents, eau de cologne, toilet requisites and preparations, cleansing compounds and other related products.

To carry on business of manufacturing and dealers in all types of packing materials, containers, receptacles, boxes, cartons, cases, drums, cages, bins, jars, carboys tubes crates, packing cases, cans, bottles, vials and fittings therefor of every kind and to manufacture and deal in paper, plastic, Bakelite, celluloid, glass, wood, ply-wood, hardboard, strawboard and boards of all other description and any other material whether chemically treated or not, used for the manufacture of any of the aforesaid articles.
name: TREB LLP

idea: Yogacation India Private Limited is a start-up company incorporated in September 2019 to promote yoga and wellness across the globe. It works with reputed Yoga institutes, wellness centers, Yoga trainers to motivate individuals to adopt yoga lifestyle for the benefit of mind, body and soul. It strives to accelerate awareness and opportunities for yoga education and training with an emphasis on quality, safety, and trust. Among the prime objectives of the company is to bring a career in yoga into the mainstream and work towards women empowerment by increasing earning opportunities. Yogacation promotes tourism based on yoga and wellness so that vacation can be better utilized for health and wellness while enjoying oneness with nature. We believe in building the foundation of a medicine-free life for the present and the next generation.https://www.yogacation.com/
name: YOGACATION INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The company is promoted and managed by individuals from insurance industry. Commencement of business happened in October 2017 and have served over 100+ corporates. Recently the company has been awarded with an assignment by the Government of Maharashtra for Farmer Accidental Insurance cover, to manage and service the scheme on its behalf.

Now we are launching the Digital Point of Sales Person (POSP) mobile application with a vision to provide employment opportunity for rural youth and increase the insurance penetration in rural India.
name: AUXILLIUM INSURANCE BROKING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
we are Digitising every journey of an Individual & their Family in the

Health & Wellness arena thru Mobile First Approach. It includes e-consultancy, booking tests with labs, Buying medicine from local chemist and allowing people to manage their health by setting alerts, reminders, personalised diet plan, creating record of the vitals. 


We will deliver value to every stakeholder in the journey from individuals to local chemist , local doctors, Pathlabs, Nurses and every support services
name: PROTOSTAR IDEATEK LLP

idea: Profine logistics started with the aim to provide complete supply chain solutions specially for Medical Device and Healthcare Industry. We at  Profine logistics fully understand the supply chain requirements of the healthcare industry starting from the origin of the goods till we deliver it to the end user, that includes loading un loading requirement, transportation requirement, specific storage requirement of the products, compliance requirements and quality requirements. We provide customized solutions for our customers as per their logistical requirements from Order to Cash.
name: PROFINE LOGISTICS PRIVATE LIMITED
